queries.item: ALTER TABLE `?:vendor_plans` ADD `plan_taxapply` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', ADD `plan_taxname` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL AFTER `plan_taxapply`, ADD `plan_taxcommission` DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' AFTER `plan_taxname`, ADD `plan_taxfixed_commission` DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' AFTER `plan_taxcommission`;

ALTER TABLE `?:vendor_payouts` ADD `payout_taxapply` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', ADD `payout_taxname` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL AFTER `payout_taxapply`, ADD `payout_taxcommission` DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL AFTER `payout_taxname`, ADD `payout_taxfixed_commission` DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL AFTER `payout_taxcommission`, ADD `payout_totalcommission` DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL AFTER `payout_taxfixed_commission`;
